p: The length-frequency distributions from Kayar, Mbour and Joal had two modes at each site ( Fig 4). The first minor peak length occurred at 19 cm at Kayar and at 16 cm for both Mbour and Joal. The second major peak length occurred at 24 cm at Kayar and at 22 cm for both Mbour and Joal. Individuals caught at “Petite Côte” were smaller than those caught at “Grande Côte” ( Fig 1).
